replies.author: jinrui_w
replies.txt_content:
Translation：特斯拉权杖是一个GT中的实验中的PvP武器，他储存10^7EU，只能在GT存能设备里充电。使用特斯拉权杖攻击生物将：①不耗电②不伤血。
原文：The Tesla Staff is an experimental PvP-only weapon in the GregTech mod. The Tesla Staff holds 10 million EU (the same as an MFSU) and can only be charged in one of GregTech's energy storage devices: either the Lapotronic Energy Storage Unit, the Adjustable Energy Storage Unit or the Interdimensional Storage Unit. When attempting to use the Tesla Staff on mobs such as Zombies or Spiders, it has no effect. The arm-swing animation is played, but no EU is discharged from the weapon and the mobs take no damage.Source：http://feed-the-beast.wikia.com/wiki/Tesla_Staff
Thanks to the FTB Offical wiki!
